hero.title: Update History (Change Log)
hero.description: Change Log of APSX Platform Clinic Program supporting businesses including Clinic, Spa, Wellness, Hospital, Beauty, Elderly care, Mental Health Clinic, Eye Clinic, and all types of clinics.

items.item5: Identified queue management system (room & doctor locking)
items.item12: New barcode system for check-in, check-out, stock checking, and new reports
items.item13: Central admin system (for multi-branch): Dashboard for Admin, Manager, Doctors, and new Staff
items.item20: Appointment notification via Email and SMS with confirmation link
items.item27: System for sending/fetching results supporting both Lab and X-Ray in real time
items.item32: Coupon, membership card (limit), delivery fee rates, and tax rates system
items.item33: System for retrieving data via ID card/passport

blog2.title: Restructured + Added functionalities for bundled medications, bundled courses, bundled tests, and more (V3.9)

items.item1: Added bundled medication, bundled course, and bundled test functionalities
items.item2: Modified test procedures to allow bundling of medications and equipment for cost reduction
items.item3: Updated course limits to allow specifying an end date within the course
items.item8: Added branch reports including: Course sales summary, Medication/equipment sales summary, Course usage report, Customer sales summary, Revenue summary report, and Income report
items.item9: Revised medication consumption process in draft registration
items.item10: Added payment via credit card/installment through PaySolutions
items.item11: Added Cashback system configurable for points and discount coupons with tiered options applicable to customer groups (Coupons will be applied to subsequent bills)

blog3.title: Restructured receipt issuance + Added clinic holiday settings (V2.1 - V3.6)

items.item1: Introduced a process to generate cross-branch receipts with selection of customers from different branches â€“ linking inspection data, lab results, images, important documents, and remaining course balances
items.item2: Added clinic holiday settings allowing configuration and toggle on/off
items.item3: Updated database to support bundled medications and courses, releasing soon
items.item4: Added an option for medication selection to trigger allergy notifications
items.item5: Modified bundled courses to allow selecting additional medications/equipment for cost reduction
items.item6: Enabled continuous editing of draft receipts
items.item7: When transactions originate from examination rooms during draft registration, a Lab Save button is displayed (if lab items exist)
items.item8: Added an option to hide notes in receipt documents
